server-ip.help: IPv4 address of FortiToken Mobile push services server (format: xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx).
server-ip.name: server-ip

server-port.help: Port to communicate with FortiToken Mobile push services server (1 - 65535, default = 4433).
server-port.name: server-port

status.help: Enable/disable the use of FortiToken Mobile push services.
status.name: status
